Account.title: Account
Account.description: Represents a user account for the Trek Explorer application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Account entity.

definition.description: Stores user account information. Uses path-based ownership for security.

params.name: accountId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user account, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

firestore.reasoning: The data structure prioritizes security and scalability by adhering to the principles of Authorization Independence, Structural Segregation, and Access Modeling. The core structure is based around user accounts stored in `/accounts/{accountId}`. This path-based ownership model simplifies security rules. Because this is a profile document for the authenticated user, no denormalization is required.  List operations are inherently secure as they are scoped to the individual user.
